text: انا مرسلوا۟ الناقة فتنة لهم فارتقبهم واصطبر

translations.translation: We will send the she-camel as a trial for them. Just keep a watchful eye on them and be steadfast.
We shall send the she-camel to try them. So watch them, and be constant.
We shall send the she-camel as a trial for them; so watch their end with patience.
We are sending the she-camel to them to test them. So watch them and be patient.
“We shall send a she-camel to test them, therefore O Saleh, wait and have patience.”
Verily, We are sending the she-camel as a test for them. So watch them, and be patient!
Surely We are going to send the she-camel as a trial for them; therefore watch them and have patience.
They shall send the She-camel as a trial for them; so watch thou them and keep patience.
Lo! We are sending the she-camel as a test for them; so watch them and have patience;
for We are [going to] send the she-camel as a trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
Verify We are sending the she-camel as a test for them, so watch them thou and have patience.
We are sending the She-camel as a trial for them; so watch them and be steadfast.
For We will send the she-camel by way of trial for them. So watch them, (O Salih), and possess thyself in patience!
Verily, We are sending the she-camel as a test for them. So watch them [O Salih (Saleh)], and be patient!
We are sending to them as a trial, a shecamel, so watch them and have patience.
We are sending the she-camel as a test for them; so watch them and be patient.
Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.

[54:27] Lo! We are sending the She-camel, We will bring it forth out of the mountain, the rock, as they demanded, as a trial, a test, for them, that We may try them. So watch them, O Sālih, await [to see] what they will do and what will be done with them, and remain patient (istabir: the tā’ here has replaced the tā’ of [the 8th form] ifta‘ala), in other words, endure their harm.

Then Allah said to Salih: (Lo! We are sending the she-camel) We shall bring forth the she-camel from the rock (as a test for them) as a trial for your folk; (so watch them) wait until the she-camel is brought forth (and have patience) for the harm coming to you and for the killing of the she-camel;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ } معناه انتَظرهم واصبرْ، وهذا قَبلَ أنْ يُؤمرُ بالقِتالِ

translations.translation: And His saying, {So wait for them and be patient} means to wait for them and be patient, and this is before being ordered to fight.

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { إِنا مرسلوا الناقةِ } باعثوها ومخرجوها من الهضبة كما سألوا، { فتنةً لهم } ابتلاءً وامتحاناً لهم، مفعول له، أو: حال، { فارتقبهم } فانتظرهم وتبصّر ما هم صانعون { واصْطَبر } على أذاهم، ولا تعجل حتى ياتيك أمري
